title: 301: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 8 (Bunions, Birthdays, & Brendan Got Worse w/ Sophie James)
itunes:title: 301: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 8 (Bunions, Birthdays, & Brendan Got Worse w/ Sophie James)
description:
It’s BIP recap time and The Broads are joined by the amazing and hilarious Sophie James! They discuss the most recent updates regarding BTS of Natasha/Pieper/ Brendan, “disgruntled females”, the show’s playbook, thoughts on the whipped cream and toe sucking, James still being here, Tammy’s birthday, Kendall and Ivan, Kenny’s in love, Dr. Joe and Sophie’s upcoming wedding, and a whole lot more! 

 

SOPHIE ELIZABETH JAMES:FOLLOW AT: https://www.instagram.com/unpaid_emotional_labor/VENMO: sejames613
